name: Autumn Platformer
description:
A fairly straight forward Platformer made within 3 days for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022

Controls:

Left + Right: Movement
Up: Jump (I know this is weird, but it was done so that one hand is used on the keyboard to play)
Down: speed up / dismiss text boxes
Mouse: Left click on Boxes to trade positions with it.
Escape: Restart the current level
